doc.title: Ryan's Hope

credit.role: Twice Divorced Lady checking Frank out.
Delia Reid Ryan Ryan Coleridge Crane

doc.plot: Set in Riverside on the upper West Side of Manhattan, Ryan's Hope centered mostly on the working class Ryans, an Irish-American family headed by Maeve and Johnny Ryan. They owned Ryan's Bar, a pivotal location for character interaction. The Ryans' dreams and ambitions made up most of the stories.
